Detailed Description

Obsolete - use Window::SetSoftkey instead, there is no need anymore to add a softkeybar to the window.

The SoftkeyBar is a container for softkeys. When the softkey has been pressed an action will be executed. The softkeys are numbered from 0 to the number of softkeys - 1 defined in KeyboardConfig.

void SoftkeyBar::SetPressedIndex (  INT  pressed_idx  ) 
 

Sets the index which indicates, that a softkey is pressed. Index of pressed softkey. Use -1 to indicate, that no softkey has been pressed.

void SoftkeyBar::Trigger (  INT  idx  )  const
 

Executes the action and fires the message, which has been assigned to the softkey.

Parameters:
idx Index of the softkey, which should be triggered.
